Technique: CARVED; POLISHED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Necklace
Description: Part of the jewellery and cosmetic items from the burial of a young woman, including this faience and cornelian bead string, a calcite kohl jar and lid, calcite jar, slate palette and grinder, bead strings and a cornelian scarab amulet. Intact burials are rare at all periods, and this group shows the range of personal goods owned by young, upper class women at Abydos in the late Old Kingdom.
